website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance Ralaxa was commended for the comfort it delivered. It was also lauded for its lightweight nature and supportive build.
pros: Almost all of the New Balance Ralaxa purchasers were impressed with how comfortable it was for long periods of walking
Many owners marked the trainer as having a perfect fit
The lightweight nature of the footgear delighted multiple testers
Several people raved about the supportive upper
cons: A few folks recommended replacing the insole for better arch support

customer_reviews.title: Will not last 100 miles
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered on the 17th of Feb. It is now the 14th of May and I only wear the to take the dogs on a 2 mile walk. With less then 100 miles on the shoes, the tread is almost completely worn out. I will not be buying this model again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little narrower and snugger than other New Balance shoes with the exact same size
customer_reviews.text: I would give the product 5 * but it's a little bit narrow compared to other New Balance shoes of the same size and width. It feels a little bit snug, but still comfortable enough to keep it. One reviewer said the toe box is too big, but actually it is smaller compared to another New Balance walking shoe and a New Balance training shoe I have, both of which are exactly the same size according to New Balance ranking system. New Balance needs to exercise a little more oversight of its Asian shoe assembly businesses.
customer_reviews.author: Konga76

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 1/2 shoe in the more expensive U.S. made New Balance and had to get a 9 in these. To me these are 1/4 size smaller. It is very light and feels good wearing. The cloth material is soft and looks good unless you pull your shoe stings tight, then it causes wrinkles in the material. I like my shoes a little loose so this is OK with me. I also wear orthotic inserts so I cant tell you about the cushioning in the step of the shoe. All in all, I like the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: BhamMan

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've worn nothing but New Balance or Nikes for years now partly because they have the best arch support and cushioning in the soles. These continue that trend. The only thing I've noticed is that I've had to go from size 11 to 11.5. Don't know if it's them or me.
customer_reviews.author: OrygunDuck

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Supportive Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is awesome. Fits like typical New Balance would. Great support for supination and comfortable insole. Was supposed to be delivered on 5/27 when purchased and charged. Four days prior to delivery, expected date was changed to 5/31. Actually delivered 5/30. Wish Prime delivery would keep their promised dates.
customer_reviews.author: Matt West

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and supportive. I work on my feet quite a bit. Now I can come home and keep going around the house with dogs. Almost forgot I had them on. TIP: As with any cloth shoe I buy I always spray 2 coats of waterproofing prior to wear after a confirmed size fit. This aids in life of the shoe and a clean appearance till worn out. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many size 14 extra wide sneakers over the last three years. I had high hopes for this based on a friend's review. Have worn for about 2 months about twice a week. Whats Good: -Very Light, about as light as any I own -easy to put on take off due to simple tread design -looks good for a walking shoe Whats not so Good: -For a wide shoe size, this is much too narrow, my toes don't like it. -Feels like it will not stand up to a lot of use, I will adjust my rating up or down depending on if it does.
customer_reviews.author: Demanding Buyer TX

customer_reviews.title: Great-valued shoes (cheaper than women's version) but don't use in courts
customer_reviews.text: Got them for $26.96. The Women version can run from $49-65. In women tennis shoes, I usually wear a size 7.5 wide and even 8 to allow for extra toe space and spread during intense activities. Men's size are supposedly 1.5 size bigger. So, the 7 I got was technically an 8.5. BUT, these shoes seems to run slightly small and narrow. Although still slightly big, it almost fit with thick socks. One small annoyance is that these don't provide enough grip on a typical basketball court. I have slipped every time. However, the traction is enough for most surfaces including wet, slippery pavements.
customer_reviews.author: Lsetamorph

customer_reviews.title: A foot blessing
customer_reviews.text: Always bought Adidas and Nike, but always ended up with painful hurting feet. Then after getting plantar fasciitis, I went on a search for a WALKING shoe. Needless to say, these shoes where in my price range and good for arch support. My feet love these and the 16 hour days on the job are a breeze for my feet now. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Why are the laces always too long?
customer_reviews.text: New Balance shoes fit me better than most other brands. The only complaint and it is a consistent complaint with this brand. Evidently some bean counter figured they could save big $$$ by only using one length of shoelace for all of their sizes. I'm always double knotting these overlong shoelaces and I still find myself tripping on them. Cost you a star New Balance. You heartless bastards.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ettinger

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these shoes a few months now and because I purchased a lesser quality NB than I normally get, I didn't think about complaining. After reading other comments about size I realized I was not the only one. I have been wearing NB for many years and have never had an any problems till now. These are a little smaller than my other NBs and overall a bit flimsy. I guess you get what you pay for. Next time I will try the store.
customer_reviews.author: Chauncey Perry

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe at a great price, BUT seems to run a full size small
customer_reviews.text: Received the shoes yesterday, so this review is primarily in regards to the sizing. I have several other pairs of shoes that are size 11 and they fit perfectly. Based on the other reviews, I bought 1/2 size larger. Unfortunately, it seems that these shoes run extremely small as the 1/2 size increase still leaves my toes extremely cramped. For the time I used them on my walking treadmill, they were comfortable (other than the size issue). I would recommend these if you size up.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Received this around the middle of May 2020. I've worn these good looking shoes every day because they felt better, but.......I just put them in the closet and put my old New Balance shoes back on and I am getting much less pain in my ankles (severe arthritis.). I guess the ankle support gave out. That's only 5 months of wear. Too late to return now.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy149

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and I bought a 4E. It was the width as expected. I ended up buying two different New Balance shoes and both were very comfortable. This shoe is more for everyday wear. I have not run in the shoe. But it is very nice for everyday use and wear.
customer_reviews.author: Fourblocks

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, ended up hurting my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of long distance walking and was excited to get a good pair of shoes that were advertised as walking shoes. When I got them they immediately felt strange. After wearing them for two weeks as my primary walking shoe I started have really bad foot pains. I examined the shoes closer and realized the right shoe was not level with the ground, but was angled inward a fairly significant amount. The other shoe was flat. It caused a lot of pain on my opposite foot that was overcompensating. It’s possible I got a defective pair, but that was my experience with these sneakers. I would definitely not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 12 4E. Have for more than a decade. I bought these on Amazon and after walking a mile in them, I realized that no matter how much walking I do to break them in, they will always be too narrow and too tight. And now that they show a little wear on the tread, I doubt I'll be able to return them to Amazon, since their policy info says they only accept return of new unworn shoes. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: vincent89

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my Dad
customer_reviews.text: They are very cushioned! Great for walking and having heel problems. I bought these for my dad and he said they fit to size. He wears a wide. I got him a 1/2 size bigger because of socks and they’ve been great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: My new lab needs to walk 5 miles a day or more. I'm wearing out lots of shoes. The Relaxa are cloth shoes with a light weight sole. These shoes are a good value buy. I love the blue shoes.
customer_reviews.author: steve510

customer_reviews.title: Great, except...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome styling and color balance. Shoes I got were one size too small at the toe and pre-arch end of the shoe. I think that my shoes were mis-marked or the manufacturinig process was too component thrifty, so I'll donate my size 9 shoes as size 8 wide. Pity. I love the style, HATE the fit. Never this style again.
customer_reviews.author: Will A.

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: When these shoes first arrived, they felt too small, although the size was correct. One or two outings, and they are now fitting fine; I guess they needed to stretch out a bit. Now, they're a perfect fit and very comfortable. The fabric is very breathable, so you'll want to stay out of wet grass.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Fit Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect but not sure how long they will last. Not built like running shoes. Cushioning will probably not hold up very long.
customer_reviews.author: smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Finally, after trying 7 pairs, the perfect walking shoes. No more sore feet or blisters. I walk 10 miles every day so this is important.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Illes

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: VERY COMFORTABLE AND WELL BUILT. SIZING IS ACCURATE. LOOKING FORWARD TO PUTTING A LOT OF MILES ON THESE. AND...THEY LOOK GREAT !!
customer_reviews.author: PATHRCO

customer_reviews.title: It’s like walking on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are even more comfortable than I expected. I am a registered nurse so I am on my feet 12+ hours a day. These shoes are able to hold up against that and my feet are no longer aching at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Gift for husband...
customer_reviews.text: He is very satisfied with the fit and comfort of this shoe. He requires a wide shoe and this fit the bill
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Green

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are so light that I was a bit skeptical at first but having worn them many times to work out they are very comfortable and provide excellent support . I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JDJ

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love this sneaker. They are very lightweight and comfortable. I usually wear a 10 wide in women's and in these sneakers I bought an mens 8 extra wide for more comfort. They came very quickly. Also I bought the darker gray it has a nice combo of grey & black with the white bottom. I saw the lighter gray ones in the store once and they give it a very different look.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: K Mart like shoes
customer_reviews.text: have you ever bought shoes at k mart? very inexpensive and you can tell. these are the same
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these lightweight sneakers for walking the dog! They’re affordable and sturdy, and one of the few styles that come in extra wide sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Not made in USA
customer_reviews.text: I was of the thinking that New Balance was made in USA and some are but not this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: They put the Cush in cushioning!
customer_reviews.text: They are aptly named very comfortable for walking. Lots of cushioning while still looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes by far
customer_reviews.text: Best fit so far . My foot doctor says I have New Balance feet so I have many styles. These are the most comfortable by far
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for general walking around and going to the gym. They are great for both of these purposes. The price I pad for them was very reasonable. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and a great value, especially for a New Balance product.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Dog

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in every step
customer_reviews.text: Never had a shoe like it! If you're person that have to walk alot... This is the shoe for you
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. King

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for my daily 1 1/2 mile walks. Good support.
customer_reviews.author: spiffdrums

customer_reviews.title: these are super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just received them and wearing theme to work for the first time and they are really comfortable not sure how long they will hold up but for now they are nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: donny bass

customer_reviews.title: this shoe won't weigh you down
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact it came in extra wide. unfortunately my foot requires an xx-wide width and that may be very hard to find. I am unfamiliar with the type of material used for the upper portion so it was a gamble on whether or not I could count on them stretching out a little.
customer_reviews.author: jo berger

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pair of shoes for workouts or everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Terrific workout shoes for the gym! My husband has narrow feet but these shoes were a fairly good fit than other brands that are too loose. Color was as described and the upper material seemed durable but comfortable. Will be his favorite shoes for vacations or everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Kroese

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes... wear them daily. No complaints... true to size
customer_reviews.author: Healthy4Life

customer_reviews.title: New Balance walking shoe. Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He really likes the walking shoe and the extra wide fit
customer_reviews.author: saph

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in 60 days—Not made in America
customer_reviews.text: After two months of average walking on sidewalk, the eyelets for the laces blew out. Not made in America. Literally fell to pieces after 60 days. Shame on New Balance. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: A very well cushioned walk.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Fits very well. Very soft to walk in. The price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Breyley

customer_reviews.title: VERY LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: They are a little small but very light. IF you need a lot of arch support you will need inserts and there is not enough room for that.
customer_reviews.author: N. Christianson

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: In general love the shoe. Very comfortable. It’s just a little shorter in length than other brands . Toe is close to the front but doesn’t interfere with comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of New Balance, I like that they have wide options as I have wide feet. This one is amazing on foot . I wear 41 EU size 25.5cm and chose 7.5, fits great! but could also chose 8 still would be good, just a bit loose
customer_reviews.author: Garnik Sevoyan

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes honesty felt very cheaply made. Yes they are lightweight but they have zero support and a very soft sole on the bottom that looks like it would only hold up I doors. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this shoe. It's light and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaele

customer_reviews.title: Not a  serios walking shoe.......
customer_reviews.text: Shoe has nice looks and fit as expected. One big issue is the sole. Oher than toe and outside of heel, sole is the foam type material. These soles don't stand a chance on asphalt or city sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Soles don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 months ago to walk the neighborhood. Average 2 miles a day and the soles are worn out. I have another pair and the same thing is happening to them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable. It is my first time ordering shoes online. The only issue I have is that the soles of the shoes appear dirty as if someone wore them before me. I am on my feet all day at work and need a wide width comfortable shoe. These shoes fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is the sole wears out very quickly. I would sacrifice it for the comfort. Brought extra pairs !!
customer_reviews.author: Meng

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is comfortable, light and gives great stability.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe!! It is light and fit is perfect! The soles are soft and so comfortable to walk all day on concrete floors without leg or lower back pain. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Best walking shoes you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: Feel great and over 8 miles of walking in one day no sore feet
customer_reviews.author: William K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: After a (quick and easy) return we ended up purchasing a size larger and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Shoelace hole ripped
customer_reviews.text: My husband never wore these he was putting them on and tightened the shoelaces up and the shoe ripped. Makes us wonder if they are knock offs. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but
customer_reviews.text: runs a half size small. I normally wear men's 11.5, but these were too tight. I ended up ordering the size 12 and donating the pair I wore for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable to wear. I recommend this shoe .
customer_reviews.author: Brett Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable walking footwear
customer_reviews.text: This a a very comfortable shoe. I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN R. WEINSTOCK

customer_reviews.title: May rub your ankles.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes rub the bottom of my ankles. The previous model is far more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hattery

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, fit as expected and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Ran a half size small.
customer_reviews.text: They were fine except they were a little small. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The look, style, and comfort. A small departure than what I usually buy from the New Balance store.
customer_reviews.author: jeff jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Run small To tight. But I like them They are on stretchers now
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH SCOLA

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, just order a half size larger or more.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McClintock

customer_reviews.title: See below
customer_reviews.text: within 5 days of wearing the shoes I developed blisters on both feet would never buy it again
customer_reviews.author: F. S.

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Ralaxa V1 Cush + Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Meet your new favorite go-to sneaker. The New Balance RALAXA men's sneaker has a sporty, trend-right design with the luxury of an all-day shoe. This Everyday Comfort Collection shoe features a Soft Supportive comfort insert to keep you comfortable on your feet all day, every day.
